content.raw: that was part of it, yeah
Is it because doxygen won't create the `build/doc` subdirectory if it didn't already exist? So doxygen fails to create `build/doc/<project>.tag.xml` because it needs `build/doc` to be created?
content.html: Is it because doxygen won't create the build/doc subdirectory if it didn't already exist? So doxygen fails to create build/doc/<project>.tag.xml because it needs build/doc to be created?

content.raw: I think it's fixed by f4164b390b4f
I've added them to the proposed branch: 3e66a12
content.html: I've added them to the proposed branch: 3e66a12

content.raw: I believe so. The format of the tagfiles was formulated to work with a direct injection into the doxygen configuration file.
content.html: I believe so. The format of the tagfiles was formulated to work with a direct injection into the doxygen configuration file.

content.raw: I'm realizing that the previous version wrapped each `... = ...` expression in quotes. Is that something we want? I can update my version to add in the quotes if they're supposed to be there.
content.html: I'm realizing that the previous version wrapped each ... = ... expression in quotes. Is that something we want? I can update my version to add in the quotes if they're supposed to be there.

content.raw:
I think the removal of `add_subdirectory(doc)` in  ed51c01 is preventing `ign-cmake` from installing its own doxygen files

so those branches aren't ready for merging yet
content.html:
I think the removal of add_subdirectory(doc) in ed51c01 is preventing ign-cmake from installing its own doxygen files

so those branches aren't ready for merging yet

content.raw: hm...I'm not seeing any docs generated with these branches
content.html: hm...I'm not seeing any docs generated with these branches

content.raw:
With the branches how they currently are, this is the output in the `api.dox`:

```
TAGFILES               = "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/doxygen/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w" "/home/grey/projects/ignition/ign-gui/doc/qt.tag.xml=http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/"    "/usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-math4_0/ignition-math4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/math/4.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-msgs1_0/ignition-msgs1.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/msgs/1.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-transport4_0/ignition-transport4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/transport/4.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-common0_1/ignition-common0.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/common/2.1"
```

I tweaked the branches [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/commits/e93099c59c663b11c47cfa0bb8823c1de3eae69f?at=doxygen_macro_nate_grey) and [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/5fc97ad7c50d41f37aae99792f20fa48aa61c99c?at=new_cmake_doc_grey) to make the inputs and outputs a bit cleaner:

```
TAGFILES               = "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/doxygen/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w"   \
    /home/grey/projects/ignition/ign-gui/doc/qt.tag.xml = http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/ \
    /usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-math4_0/ignition-math4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/math/4.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-msgs1_0/ignition-msgs1.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/msgs/1.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-transport4_0/ignition-transport4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/transport/4.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-common0_1/ignition-common0.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/common/2.1
```
content.html:
With the branches how they currently are, this is the output in the api.dox:

TAGFILES               = "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/doxygen/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w" "/home/grey/projects/ignition/ign-gui/doc/qt.tag.xml=http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/"    "/usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-math4_0/ignition-math4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/math/4.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-msgs1_0/ignition-msgs1.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/msgs/1.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-transport4_0/ignition-transport4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/transport/4.0"    "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-common0_1/ignition-common0.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/common/2.1"

I tweaked the branches here and here to make the inputs and outputs a bit cleaner:

TAGFILES               = "/usr/share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/doxygen/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w"   \
    /home/grey/projects/ignition/ign-gui/doc/qt.tag.xml = http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/ \
    /usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-math4_0/ignition-math4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/math/4.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-msgs1_0/ignition-msgs1.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/msgs/1.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-transport4_0/ignition-transport4.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/transport/4.0 \
    /usr/share/ignition/ignition-common0_1/ignition-common0.tag.xml = https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/common/2.1

content.raw: Fixed the branch. Here is an [ign-gui branch](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/branch/new_cmake_doc#diff) that uses tag files.

content.raw:
`ign_create_docs` sounds nicer than `ign_doxygen` I guess, but that branch doesn't seem to address tagfiles, which are a key piece of functionality.

There was also a [suggestion](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/issues/30/make-function-macro-for-doc-cmakeliststxt#comment-44542782) in #30 to populate the tag file information automatically based on dependency information
content.html:
ign_create_docs sounds nicer than ign_doxygen I guess, but that branch doesn't seem to address tagfiles, which are a key piece of functionality.

There was also a suggestion in #30 to populate the tag file information automatically based on dependency information

content.raw:
I started playing around with merging `ign_create_docs` and `ign_doxygen` [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/branches/compare/doxygen_macro_nate%0Ddoxygen_macro#diff). It's not polished, just a suggestion.

This would allow a repository to be like this [ign-math branch](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/ign_doxygen_macro..#diff).
content.html:
I started playing around with merging ign_create_docs and ign_doxygen here. It's not polished, just a suggestion.

This would allow a repository to be like this ign-math branch.

content.raw: Also, `function(ign_doxygen)` may be preferable to `macro(ign_doxygen)` since this isn't trying to provide any variables to the caller.
content.html: Also, function(ign_doxygen) may be preferable to macro(ign_doxygen) since this isn't trying to provide any variables to the caller.

content.raw: For the function argument, I would suggest a function signature more like `ign_doxygen(TAGFILES <list of tagfiles>)`. The arguments can be parsed using `_ign_cmake_parse_arguments`, and the function signature would be extensible in the future. By default, it would not add any tagfiles.
content.html: For the function argument, I would suggest a function signature more like ign_doxygen(TAGFILES <list of tagfiles>). The arguments can be parsed using _ign_cmake_parse_arguments, and the function signature would be extensible in the future. By default, it would not add any tagfiles.
